biography.bio: Jean Yanne was born on July 18, 1933 in Les Lilas, Seine [now Seine-Saint-Denis], France as Jean Roger Gouyé. He was an actor and writer, known for Weekend (1967), Indochine (1992) and Le Boucher (1970). He was married to Jacqueline Renée Guellerin Allard. He died on May 23, 2003 in Morsains, Marne, France.
biography.name: Jean Yanne

biography.bio: Albert Dupontel was born on January 11, 1964 in Saint-Germain-en-Laye, Seine-et-Oise, France as Philippe Guillaume. He is an actor and writer, known for Irreversible (2002), 9 mois ferme (2013) and Bernie (1996).
biography.name: Albert Dupontel

biography.bio: Roland Blanche was born on December 31, 1943 in Choisy-le-Roi, Val-de-Marne, France. He was an actor, known for La Femme Nikita (1990), Danton (1983) and Too Beautiful for You (1989). He died on September 13, 1999 in Thiais, Val-de-Marne.
biography.name: Roland Blanche

biography.bio: Michèle Laroque was born on June 15, 1960 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France. She is an actress and writer, known for Ma Vie en Rose (1997), Serial Lover (1998) and Le placard (2001).
biography.name: Michèle Laroque

biography.bio: Heinz Schubert was born on November 12, 1925 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ein Herz und eine Seele (1973), Hitler, un film d'Allemagne (1977) and Kara Ben Nemsi Effendi (1973). He was married to Ilse Schubert. He died on February 12, 1999 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Heinz Schubert

biography.bio: Pamela Knaack was born on August 12, 1963 in Hamburg, West Germany. She is an actress, known for Dunkle Tage (1999), Katrin und die Welt der Tiere (2009) and &Me (2013).
biography.name: Pamela Knaack

biography.bio: Marc Andréoni was born on February 8, 1961 in France. He is an actor and writer, known for Léon: The Professional (1994), 3 Days to Kill (2014) and District B13 (2004).
biography.name: Marc Andréoni

biography.bio: Laurent Gamelon was born on June 19, 1960 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Ruby & Quentin (2003), Confidences trop intimes (2004) and Le placard (2001).
biography.name: Laurent Gamelon

biography.bio: Franck de la Personne is known for his work on Bienvenue à Monte Carlo (2011), Le Chef (2012) and Peril (1985).
biography.name: Franck de la Personne

biography.bio: Jean Rougerie was born on March 9, 1929 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He was an actor, known for A View to a Kill (1985), Lacombe, Lucien (1974) and Get Out Your Handkerchiefs (1978). He died on January 25, 1998 in Ivry-sur-Seine, Val-de-Marne, France.
biography.name: Jean Rougerie

biography.bio: Catherine Arditi is an actress, known for Thérèse (2012), Temps de chien (1996) and Mélo (1986).
biography.name: Catherine Arditi

biography.bio: Milan Dvorák is an actor, known for Chacun pour toi (1993).
biography.name: Milan Dvorák

biography.bio: Ondrej Vetchy graduated at 1984 at Prague Conservatory in musical-drama department. His first achievement was the part of young devil in one of the best Czech fantasy for children ever - S certy nejsou zerty (There Are No Jokes with Devils) from the director Hynek Bocan. Ondrej Vetchy succeed like only one Czech movie actor at European Film Awards, when he was nominated for the part of cool masher Dan in drama Dum pro dva. He achieved in comedies as well as in dramas. His most popular characters are soldier Kefalin in comedy Cerni baroni (Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year), grave digger Broz in Oscar awarded movie by Jan Sverak Kolya (Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year), Kvido's father in Bajecna leta pod psa (Wonderful Years that Sucks, Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year, Award of Cinema Magazine for Best Actor), pilot in the Tmavomodry svet (Czech Lion nominee, Nr. 1 hit in Czech theaters of the year, Award of Cinema Magazine for Best Actor) and irresponsible son in Babi leto (Autumn Spring). Ondrej Vetchy is a member of very famous Czech theatre Cinoherni klub and he is also very successful in work for TV. Ondrej Vetchy belongs to the most popular Czech actors ever.
biography.name: Ondrej Vetchý

biography.bio: Stella Zázvorková was born on April 14, 1922 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She was an actress, known for Kolya (1996), Autumn Spring (2001) and Cosy Dens (1999). She was married to Milos Kopecký. She died on May 18, 2005 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Stella Zázvorková

biography.bio: Eliska Pohorska is an actress, known for Chacun pour toi (1993).
biography.name: Eliska Pohorska
